error.commandNotFound: Unable to find command with name ${commandName} for level ${levelName}.
error.blockBlockingInVCR: Unable to place block. Level is in VCR mode.
error.buildCommandBlockingInVCR: Unable to use command. Level is in VCR mode.
error.blockBlockingCommand: Unable to place block. Command in level is expecting additional arguments.

status.drainedLevelActions: Changes drained. ${bytes} bytes saved to level's VHS record.
status.playbackFinished: Playback finished! Use /main to go back.

commandQuestion.block: Place a block to use for ${currentType}. Break for air.
commandQuestion.position: Place or break a block to mark the position for ${currentType}.

topPrintInformation.viewPagination: Noclip past level borders to view the next page.

error.uncaught: &cAn error occured while running the command. ${err}
error.missingBuildPermission: You don't have permission to build in this level.
error.missingPermission: You don't have permission to use this command!
error.drainingVCR: VCR is busy. Try again later?
error.levelLoading: Level is busy seeking. Try again later?

finish.vcrReminder: Hold up! Did you mean to use /abort instead? Exit out of VCR to if you intend to submit your game.
finish.attemptFinishBuildEmpty: There is nothing in the level. Build the prompt you are given!
finish.attemptFinishDescriptionEmpty: You currently have no description for this build. Write something in chat first!

game.welcome: Welcome to Voxel Telephone. A multiplayer game where you build what you hear and describe what you see. Watch as creations transform through collaborative misinterpretation!

description.confirmReminder: Use &a/finish &rto confirm your description for this build.
description.createGame: Enter a description in chat. It can be mundane or imaginative.
